articles.description: Grant Riller scored 25 points for his 13th game this season with 20 or more and top-seed Charleston beat William & Mary 83-73 on Monday night to advance to its second straight Colonial Athletic Association Tournament championship game.
articles.headline: Charleston advances to 2nd straight CAA championship game

articles.description: Jay Bilas strongly criticizes those opposing the opportunity for college players to leave after their freshman season.
articles.headline: Bilas on one-and-done critiques: 'We have become elitist'

images.caption: Jay Bilas strongly criticizes those opposing the opportunity for college players to leave after their freshman season.
images.name: Bilas on one-and-done critiques: 'We have become elitist'

articles.description: Joe Lunardi credits quality wins as a major reason why the Kansas Jayhawks deserve a No. 1 seed in the NCAA tournament.
articles.headline: Does Kansas deserve a No. 1 seed?

images.caption: Joe Lunardi credits quality wins as a major reason why the Kansas Jayhawks deserve a No. 1 seed in the NCAA tournament.
images.name: Does Kansas deserve a No. 1 seed?

articles.description: Arkansas forward Dustin Thomas has been dismissed for an unspecified violation of team rules.
articles.headline: Arkansas' Dustin Thomas dismissed for violating team rules

images.caption: Arksansas' Dustin Thomas has been kicked off the team for a rules violation.
images.name: Kentucky v Arkansas (Dustin Thomas ) [600x400]

articles.description: Texas Tech has signed Chris Beard to a new six-year deal worth more than $19 million.
articles.headline: Texas Tech signs coach Chris Beard to six-year deal

images.caption: Chris Beard just got a new deal from Texas Tech.
images.name: Chris Beard [600x400] - Copy
